Technical issues with the course platform or software, resulting in inconvenience and frustration for students.
Difficulty in measuring student progress and understanding due to the lack of face-to-face interaction.
Potential for bias in the course content or assessments, which can impact student motivation and success.
Difficulty in creating a sense of community and collaboration among students, which can lead to feelings of isolation and disconnection.
Potential for distractions and procrastination, as students may find it challenging to stay focused on coursework.
